title: Jaguars QB battle, Dolphins future with Cutler (Football 8/25)
description:
Nick Kostos and Pete Prisco get together on a Football Friday edition of the Pick Six Podcast, starting with a breakdown of the Jaguars quarterback battle (:46) What's going on with Cam Newton and the Panthers first-team offense? (7:36) The guys discuss Jay Cutler's outlook as well as the guys surrounding him (15:29) What about Mitch Trubisky, Mike Glennon and the Chicago Bears quaterback situation? (19:29) Speaking of young QBs, the guys talk Jared Goff and the Los Angeles football market (20:56). We cover the news surrounding the Browns quarterback situation including the latest on Brock Osweiler and DeShone Kizer (26:43). Plus, a battle of New York lines as the guys debate the upcoming seasons for both the Giants offensive and Jets defensive lines (28:47). Also the latest on Kony Ealy and the Patriots (33:40) as well as some serious Game of Thrones talk (38:21)
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
